title: The Dragon
description: St. Martin's Press, hardcover with dustjacket, 1977. 2nd book in the "Atlan / Cija" saga, set in prehistoric South America and in the mythical world of Atlantis. The books in the series "The Serpent" (later editions split this book into two, "The Serpent" and "The Dragon"); "Atlan" (1965); "The City" (1966); and "Some Summer Lands" (1977).
author: Jane Gaskell
